remarks: Distributive law for the scalar product of a complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
vci.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` W ) $.
vci.2 $e |- S = ( 2nd ` W ) $.
vci.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
vcdir $p |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A + B ) S C ) = ( ( A S C ) G ( B S C ) ) ) $.
